獱字的基本解释

獱
biān
古同“猵”。

獱
piàn
古同“猵”。

獱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bīn］［biān］
［《廣韻》符真切，平真，並。］
［《集韻》卑民切，平真，幫。］
即獱獭。又称猵。

獱字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獱； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页720第17
【廣韻】符眞切【集韻】毗賔切，?音頻。【玉篇】獺屬。【廣韻】獺之別名。【孟子註】獺，獱也。【集韻】或作猵。　又【集韻】?民切，音賔。獺屬。似狐靑色，居水中，食魚。【揚雄·校獵賦】蹈獱獺。【註】蘇林曰：獱，音賔。師古曰：獱，小獺也。　又【唐韻】布懸切【集韻】?眠切，?音邊。【說文】猵，或作獱。義同。

獱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
獱字的起名意思

暂无。

獱
Basic explanation of words
獱
biān
Ancient Tong "猵".
獱

Ancient Tong "猵".
獱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bīn］［biān］
["Guangyun" Fu Zhenqi, Pingzhen, and. ]
["Ji Yun" humble people cut, plain, help. ]
That is, the otter. Also known as 猵.
獱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獱; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 720 17
[Guang Yun] Fu Sui cut [Ji Yun] Adjacent to the bladder cut, audio. [Jade articles] Otter is the genus. [Guangyun] The alias of Otter. [Mencius' Note] Otter, 獱also. 【Ji Yun】Or make Yun.　[Jiyun] again? Minqie, sound bladder. Otter. It looks like a fox, lives in the water and eats fish. [Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu] Dancing with a otter. [Note] Su Lin said: 獱, sound bladder. Shi Gu said: 獱, little otter.　[Tang Yun] Cloth Suspension Cut [Ji Yun] Sleep Cut, Sound Edge. 【Speaking text】猵, or 獱. The same meaning.
獱
